About Me

Every team needs a Landon!

Peer Opinions

"Of all the contacts in my network, I know few that have as much raw technical art knowledge as him and even fewer with the skills to match. His drive and motivation to succeed are only matched by his enthusiasm to learn more, about all aspects; be it art or life." - Rogelio Delgado

"He is the epitome of a digital renaissance man. I enjoyed my time working with Landon, not just because he was amazing at his craft, but because he has an uncanny ability to bring out the best in those around him." - Heith Seewald

"Landon, is a man of many traits, from artistic decisions, technicalities and problem solving abilities are incredible and efficient! Very calm, and has knowledge that should not be looked down. Proactive and an excellent team player!" - Joseph Briggs
